channel.title: How do i get my server to my friends computer
channel.description:
my friend wants to host my server. can someone list the steps of doing this or give me a tutorial link. it would be greatly apreciated. i would rep but i cant atm so im sorry.
thanks to all that help, r1ch13oy

item.title: How do i get my server to my friends computer
item.dc:creator: @ChaosPkers ChaosPkers
item.description:
@ChaosPkers wrote:

  1. Add your file to .rar
  2. Upload it to file sharing site
  3. E-mail it to your friend.
